page.title: 04CHILD'S DAY IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: I wake about 7.00 and turn on the television and see what's happening in the world.At 7.40 I have breakfast and cycle to school where I sit in the dining room and talk.At 8.55 the bell goes for registration.At 9.15 I go for Maths in the tower block.At 10.30 we have a break.For the rest of the morning I have History and Religious Education.At 12.00 the bell goes for lunch.I have sandwiches ,crisps and biscuits, then I go out to the play- ground and have a game of football. At 1.00 the bell goes for registration and I spend the afternoon in English and Physical Education lessons.At 3.35 I go home and use my computer to play Space Invader Games.At 6.00 I have my tea consisting of roast lamb,potatoes and cabbage,followed by cherry pie and lumpy custard.I then may watch the T.V. do my homework.
